name: Be Excellent to the Future
description:
Some most bodacious dudes have fixed the past, saved the world, and everyone is being excellent to each other! But Chuck Tannen, former gym teacher, high school bully, and a total butthole, is using time travel to enact his bogus plots. In the process, he’ll ruin not only history, but the entire future of humanity. Heavy. Fortunately, if the dickweeds can use time travel to ruin everything, you can use it to fix everything!

Take on the roles of the most excellent William, Martin, and Theodore, along with the heinous Chuck Tannen to weave together plans for breaking, or fixing, history.

BETTF is a partytelling game where players contribute story detail cards for other players to use in their efforts to manipulate history to their own ends. The dickweeds tell their plans for changing history based on a goal card they want to achieve and an event card they will target. Then the righteous dudes use detail cards their future selves put there for them to figure out how to stop the dickweeds.

Once everyone has played both roles twice, the player with the most used helpful detail cards wins. Most triumphant!

—description from the designer
categories: Party Game, Print & Play, Science Fiction
mechanics: Storytelling

name: Monopoly: Citroën Origins
description:
On the centenary of the brand, Citroën and Monopoly team up to offer you the most famous board games.

It was during the 2019 Rétromobile show, Citroën launched its own edition of the famous board game Monopoly.

This edition called Monopoly Citroën Origins is in the colours of Citroën, with the historical models of the brand on the boxes of the board game and specific cards.

The traditional tokens are replaced by vehicles of the Citroën brand. We can find series models such as 2CV, 5 HP or Traction, but also concept cars such as Cxperience or C-Métisse. The property cards are in keeping with the theme of this edition.


À l'occasion du centenaire de la marque, Citroën et Monopoly s'associent pour vous proposer le plus célèbre des jeux de société.

C'est lors du salon Rétromobile 2019 que Citroën a lancé sa propre édition du célèbre jeu de société Monopoly.

Cette édition baptisée Monopoly Citroën Origins est aux couleurs de Citroën, avec les modèles historiques de la marque. On peut trouver des modèles de série tels que 2CV, 5 CV ou Traction, mais aussi des concept cars comme Cxperience ou C-Métisse. Les cartes de propriété s'inscrivent dans le thème de cette édition.

Pour gagner la partie, il faudra savoir acheter, spéculer, vendre mais surtout négocier. Mais attention à la banqueroute, à vous de bien choisir le chemin à suivre pour ruiner les autres joueurs et arriver premier !
mechanics: Auction/Bidding, Income, Lose a Turn, Player Elimination, Set Collection, Trading

name: Pitcoin
description:
Trade cards with between two and five other players to be the first to collect the entire set of one cryptocurrency. Inspired byt the classic game, Pit, trades are carried out blind and simultaneously with all players in this frantic party game.

Each cryptocurrency has a value and the first player to 500 wins. But be careful, because the value of each coin fluctuates and players can use the 'Crash the Market' card to boost the value of their holdings and destroy their opponents'.

Players can also use the 'Blockchain' card to temporarily halt trading and see what another player is holding in their hand.

—description from the publisher
categories: Action / Dexterity, Card Game, Party Game
mechanics: Auction/Bidding, Commodity Speculation, Simultaneous Action Selection, Trading

name: Monopoly: Sevilla FC
description:
A Monopoly about the Sevilla Fútbol Club, created in 1890.

Play classic Monopoly, but this time being a professional sports manager. Invest in stands and stadiums, rent and spend the money in the official store.

Roll the dice and move around the board thanks to the pawns and travel through the best of the history of Sevilla F.C. - stadiums, best players, and the great victories in team history.
mechanics: Auction/Bidding, Income, Lose a Turn, Player Elimination, Set Collection, Trading

name: Monopoly: FC Porto
description:
If your admiration for the FC Porto exceeds the limits of the pitch, consider yourself invited to play in this board game!

Conquer properties like you win titles, with the blue and white jersey, in this exclusive edition of Monopoly F.C. Porto

Se a tua admiração pelo clube do Porto ultrapassa os limites do relvado, considera-te convocado para jogares neste jogo de tabuleiro!

Conquista propriedades como quem conquista títulos, com a camisola azul e branca vestida, nesta edição exclusiva do Monopoly F.C. Porto
mechanics: Auction/Bidding, Income, Lose a Turn, Player Elimination, Roll / Spin and Move, Set Collection, Trading

name: Harry Potter Miniatures Adventure Game: Fenrir Expansion Pack
description:
Fenrir Greybackmight not be as known as other villains from the Wizarding World, but he sure is one of the worst! This werewolf finds a strange pleasure biting children aiming to create enough werewolves to overcome the wizards. Fenrir was the one who turned Remus Lupin into a wolf when he was a child and lead a gang of snatchers when Voldemort wasin control of the Ministry of Magic.

Includes character card and mini cards for Harry Potter Miniatures Adven­ture Game.
categories: Adventure, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Miniatures, Movies / TV / Radio theme, Novel-based
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Grid Movement, Modular Board, Variable Player Powers

name: Begloomed, the Card Game
description:
Begloomed the Card Game, is inspired by iD Software’s popular First Person Shooter from 1993. 1 or more players is charged with saving their Mainframe from Glooms. Players use cards to create level maps, rooms, as well as positions for Items and Enemies.

Playing is an exciting adventure of exploration, combat, and survival as you try to eliminate the viruses that are invading the Mainframe from another dimension and collect the key codes to unlock the Firewalls.

Players begin each Level by drawing and arranging 16 Map Cards so they are all connected. As they move onto each Map Card, they are entering a new Room and then must draw 10 Room Cards and place them anywhere on the Room Mat.

Then they draw 3 Item/Weapon Cards and 3 Monsters Cards. These may be placed anywhere in the Room, but must be at least 3 squares away from the Hero's starting position. Line of sight is critical, as players may not target objects behind walls and storage containers. Finally, they move through the Room picking up the Items/Weapons and defeating or avoiding the various Monsters.

This process is repeated for each Room until they have picked up the 3 Key Codes to unlock the Firewall and advance to the next Level.

Levels increase in difficulty as more Monsters are added every 3rd Level. Adding players means doubling the Monsters per Room and then everyone works together to clear each Level.

Players continue playing and clearing Levels infinitely.

—description from the designer
mechanics: Area Movement, Cooperative Game, Grid Movement, Line of Sight, Pieces as Map, Tile Placement

name: Procup: Le Jeu
description:
Procup: club

1- Make your team of 3 players among all the players of your favorite French football team.

2- Play all 3 matches to be the 1st to win the final and thus win the Procup!

But watch out for red cards ...

The dice are the central elements of this game. They are the ones who will decide the successes and failures. Whoever masters them will become the Champion!

No "football" skills are therefore required. No special knowledge of the club is therefore necessary. It is only chance that will designate the Winner ...
and what could be nicer than beating a football fan on his own turf?
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Events, Track Movement

name: Monopoly: Édition des Légendes – Paris Saint-Germain
description:
With this exclusive edition, live the Monopoly experience by paying tribute to the legendary players of the famous Parisian club.
All the legends of PSG are there!
Contents of the box: 1 game board, 8 pawns, 28 title deeds, 16 Away cards, 16 Home cards, 1 pack of banknotes for Monopoly, 32 bleachers, 12 stadiums, 2 dice and 1 game rule

Avec cette edition exclusive, vivez l'expérience Monopoly en rendant hommage aux joueurs mythiques du célèbre club parisien.
Toutes les légendes du PSG sont là !

Contenu de la boîte : 1 plateau de jeu, 8 pions, 28 titres de propriété, 16 cartes Away, 16 cartes Home, 1 paquet de billets de banque pour Monopoly, 32 gradins, 12 stades, 2 dés et 1 règle du jeu
mechanics: Auction/Bidding, Income, Lose a Turn, Player Elimination, Roll / Spin and Move, Set Collection, Trading

name: Pop-A-Plane
description:
Pop-A-Plane is a promotional Australian board game produced by Maize Products Pty Ltd during the Second World War.
The object of the game is for players to shoot down opposing aircraft. To achieve this a player aims a movable metal field gun at a numbered plane and calls the numbered plane. Then the player rolls the dice. If the number on the dice matches the number on the selected plane then the plane is shot down. If there is no match the other player takes their turn.
The winner is the player who shoots down all the opposing enemy aircraft.

—user summary
mechanics: Dice Rolling

name: Monopoly: Athletic Club Bilbao
description:
Monopoly Rojiblanco - Athletic Club Bilbao
Lezama (Training HQ), San Mamés (stadium), the titles ... everything has its price.

Una edición exclusiva de Monopoly que incluye características diferenciadoras de las versiones normales del juego, como las casillas, que en vez de calles son momentos históricos y lugares emblemáticos del equipo rojiblanco como San Mamés, Lezama, la primera Liga, el equipo femenino, etc. Asímismo, las casas y hoteles se convierten ahora en gradas y estadios.

Las casillas 'Paseo del Prado' y 'Paseo de la Castellana', las más caras en la versión tradicional son aquí el escudo actual (400M) y la bandera (350M), las más baratas, justamente, el primer emblema e imagen del club rojiblanco.
mechanics: Auction/Bidding, Income, Lose a Turn, Player Elimination, Set Collection, Trading

name: Monopoly: Inter
description:
The most famous board game in the world is enriched with this edition dedicated to the famous Internazionale team of Milan.
Build your empire and amass fortunes, but beware of taxes, jail and bankruptcy.
mechanics: Auction/Bidding, Income, Lose a Turn, Player Elimination, Set Collection, Trading

name: Monopoly: S.L.Benfica
description:
With this edition, live the Monopoly experience by managing the famous Lisboner club.
Become the best manager of Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
Travel through the most outstanding stadiums in the history of Sport Lisbon and Benfica: the best moments, the best players and the great victories that made us vibrate.
Build new benches and stadiums, collect rents and spend your funds in the Official Store.
Be astute and keep alert, because only one can win; for the rest, awaits bankruptcy.
The Path to Success is marked by itself; Be the owner of everything!
Who will be the winner?

—description from the publisher
mechanics: Auction/Bidding, Lose a Turn, Player Elimination, Roll / Spin and Move, Set Collection, Trading

name: Fairy's Smoothie (フェアリーズ・スムージー)
description:
Fairy smoothie is a game from Japan.
Players are fairies working on a farm. They work hard to make delicious crop. But fairies love smoothies and mischief. Sneak around and steal the crops while playing tricks on the other fairies to create the best smoothies possible!

If there are less than two places to move, the game ends.
After the tokens are scored and the final bonus is added, the person with the highest score is the winner.

On a turn:
1. The parent player places a supervisor card face down in the center.
2. Children move their squares 1 or 2 at a time in a clockwise direction.
3. The parent reveals the Surveillance Spot card and takes one token from the child in the square with the card.
4. The child players who were not robbed get the adjacent tokens in turn, and the card's effect is applied.
mechanics: Betting and Bluffing, Set Collection

name: Good Cop Bad Cop: Deliriant Promo Card
description:
Available from TWIST Gaming Year 4 Kickstarter campaign.

Shuffle the card with the game equipment cards.

When used:
Choose a player to shuffle all their integrity cards and place them face-down without looking at any of them. They may not view their face-down integrity cards for the rest of the game.

Also included in the 2024 Equipment Pack 1 as part of Good Cop Bad Cop 4th edition kickstarter.
categories: Card Game, Deduction, Expansion for Base-game, Party Game
mechanics: Hand Management, Memory, Player Elimination, Take That, Team-Based Game

name: Monopoly: Roma
description:
The most famous family board game in the world, offers you another exciting edition of Monopoly - AS Roma
Choose your lucky marker, land on your favorite boxes, build fortunes, but watch out for tax boxes, jail time and avoid bankruptcy
Monopoly ranks the formations that have made the history of Rome
If ready to build the stadium for your favorite formation and win the game
The fast and fun trading game for the whole family




Il piu' famoso gioco da tavolo per famiglie del mondo, ti offre un'altra entusiasmante edizione di Monopoly - AS Roma
Scegli il tuo segnalino fortunato, arriva sulle tue caselle preferite, accumula fortune, ma fai attenzione alle caselle delle tasse, al carcere ed evita fallimento
Monopoly schiera le formazioni che hanno fatto la storia della roma
Se pronto a costruire lo stadio per la tua formazione preferita e vincere la partita
Il gioco di compravendita veloce e divertente per tutta la famiglia
mechanics: Auction/Bidding, Income, Lose a Turn, Player Elimination, Set Collection, Trading

name: MOD-BOTS
description:
MOD-BOTS is a 3D printable game where players assemble their robots from a variety of interchangeable pieces with matching dice. The base game includes four heads, four bodies, four legs, and eight arms. This allows for over 2000 unique combinations of MOD-BOT parts!

Players choose three of their available dice to roll and then compares symbols on the dice. Shields cancel Hits, while Skulls are hits that cannot be canceled. The player who takes the most hits loses one of their dice and must remove a part from their MOD-BOT. The piece isn't lost forever though, it goes to the scrapyard with other extra parts, where it could be regained by either player when rolling a Repair symbol. When only one player has any remaining dice, they win!
categories: Children's Game, Dice, Fighting, Print & Play
mechanics: Die Icon Resolution

name: Monopoly: Valencia CF
description:
Show that you are the best, with the exclusive edition of Monopoly Valencia CF.
Live the life of a great manager in the fast-paced world of professional sports. Put yourself in the shoes of a successful Valencia CF manager.
Now you have the possibility to show your Valencianismby playing a game of Monopoly with this official edition of Valencia CF.
Property Titles: all values are the same as their equivalents in classic Monopoly
The four corners do not change, as does the way to win: the player who remains after the rest of the players have been ruined, wins the game
The stations and services boxes now include: Bus, Official Stores, Changing Room, Sports City, Valencia CF Tour and Mestalla Stadium
The houses and hotels are now stands and stadiums




Demuestra que eres el mejor con la edición exclusiva de Monopoly Valencia CF.
Vive la vida de un gran gestor en el vertiginoso mundo del deporte profesional. Ponte en el lugar de un exitoso manager del Valencia CF.
Ahora tienes la posibilidad de demostrar tu valencianismo, jugando una partida de Monopoly con esta edición oficial del Valencia CF.
Títulos de Propiedad: todos los valores son iguales a los de sus equivalentes en el clásico Monopoly
Las cuatro esquinas no cambian, al igual que el modo de ganar: el jugador que se mantenga una vez el resto de jugadores se hayan arruinado, gana el juego
Las casillas de estaciones y servicios incluyen ahora: Autobús, Tiendas O ciales, Vestuario, Ciudad Deportiva, Tour Valencia CF y Estadio de Mestalla
Las casas y hoteles ahora son gradas y estadios
mechanics: Auction/Bidding, Lose a Turn, Player Elimination, Roll / Spin and Move, Set Collection, Trading
publishers: Eleven Force, Hasbro, Winning Moves UK Ltd.

name: Monopoly: D-Day – 06.06.1944
description:
With Monopoly D-Day, take part in the greatest military operation of all time!
Invest the highly strategic places and lay your foundations to become the hero of Operation Overlord!
Monopoly D-DAY 06/06/1944: board game where the goal is to be the last player not to go bankrupt.
Bilingual French and English game!

—description from the publisher (translated)

Avec le Monopoly D-Day, participez à la plus grande opération militaire de tous les temps !
Investissez les lieux hautement stratégiques et posez vos jalons pour devenir le héros de l'opération Overlord ! Monopoly D-DAY 06/06/1944 : jeu de société où le but est d'être le dernier joueur à ne pas faire faillite.
Jeu bilingue Français et Anglais !

—description from the publisher
mechanics: Auction/Bidding, Income, Lose a Turn, Player Elimination, Set Collection, Trading

name: Fruit Salad: The Multiple Games in One Game
description:
Fruit Salad is a card game that has multiple games in one. Fruit Salad functions as a collection of games and a tool to make new games using the same pieces. The games vary from,


Simple games easy for younger gamers and still entertaining for more experienced gamers.



Fast paced games that throw out the idea of taking turns for a fun free -for-all style .



Games that challenge gamers by making them face off with other gamers in a game of wits.


The kind of games Fruit Salad contains is limitless. Fruit Salad is a fun, colorful game that helps fill the need for all sorts of gamers.

—description from the designer
categories: Card Game, Children's Game, Educational, Game System, Memory, Party Game, Travel
mechanics: End Game Bonuses, Force Commitment, Matching, Memory, Open Drafting, Paper-and-Pencil, Player Elimination, Push Your Luck, Set Collection, Solo / Solitaire Game, Sudden Death Ending, Take That

name: Monopoly: Celtic Legends Edition
description:
Tour the unique history of Celtic FC, from its establishment in 1888 and winning their first ever match — against Rangers FC — to today's successful side.

Tour the board and buy legends from the Celtic FC and other football greats plus current players and managers. Build stands then upgrade to stadium and watch the rent come pouring in. Take your chances with Home and Away cards as you tour the board as one of the classic football Monopoly tokens.

Choose your favourite token, tour your favourite players and managers and accumulate fortunes, but watch out for agent fees, jail and bankruptcy.

Advance to Jock Stein, Artur Boruc and Henrik Larrson — will you owe rent or reap the rewards?

Build stands and stadium and trade your way to success.
mechanics: Auction/Bidding, Income, Lose a Turn, Player Elimination, Set Collection, Trading
publishers: Parker Brothers, Winning Moves UK Ltd.

name: Counting Coup and Cutting Horses
description:
A set of rules for wargaming in the Old West from 1700 to 1890 A.D.. Mechanics are fun, easy and innovative. Suitable for solo, cooperative, or head to head play.

The focus is on inter tribal wars especially those of the Plains Indians. But mountain men, rangers, cowboys, the regular U.S. army, Navahos, Apaches, and immigrant woodland and southeastern tribes are also covered.

The game is played with miniature figures of any scale. A unique feature is the use of playing cards in place of dice to resolve game mechanics. Players draw cards from a standard card deck, which is reshuffled periodically. Cards determine activation, movement distances, the outcome of shooting or melee combat, and of pin and morale tests. There are extensive notes on specific native American tribes and a system to play solo.
mechanics: Campaign / Battle Card Driven, Card Play Conflict Resolution, Scenario / Mission / Campaign Game

name: Trepidation: Horror card game
description:
Trepidation is a cooperative horror survival game, where players are trying trying to make it to the end of the forest. All players are given a role card at the beginning of the game, which is broken down by the townspeople and the possessed role. Townspeople are trying to make it to the end of the forest, while the possessed player is trying to have everyone killed before they reach the end.

There are monsters and events standing in between you and your escape. Your survival will depend upon collecting and trading items, strategizing, and figuring out whom to trust in your party. Can you make it out of the forest alive?

Every player is dealt a limited number of location and item cards. The location cards are used throughout the game to progress through the forest. Each location card will indicate whether you will draw an item, event, or monster card for that turn.

There are unique location cards found within the deck called landmarks. The landmarks are what you will be searching for and must complete as a group to continue your progress through the forest. Depending on the difficulty you select at the beginning of the game, you will have to complete either 3, 5 or 7 landmarks to make it out of the forest. Planning ahead is a necessity, as the landmarks will force the entire party to combat monsters the moment they are played.

Every monster has a unique way that it must be warded off. Some monsters are more problematic, and even more perilous to come across than others. Use your items and plan ahead in order to overcome that which awaits you and your team.

Be careful, though, as the possessed player may try to deceive you. They can use the event, item and landmark cards to their advantage, and will try blending in as a normal towns person throughout the game... waiting until your guard is down before sabotaging you.
mechanics: Hand Management, Team-Based Game

name: The Legend of Ezmerelda
description:
The Legend of Ezmerelda, is inspired by Nintendo’s popular RPG from 1986. 1 or more players explore the world while: meeting new allies, discovering dungeons, and combating throngs of enemies, in order to recover lost artifacts and return them to their owners.

Playing is a creative adventure that triggers the imagination as the story unfolds that is unique to each game. Use a six(6)-side die in combination with cards and maps to explore the world and recover artifacts, while gaining experience with their character and increasing various stats. Characters must observe the passage of time for practicing skills and abilities, 1 game hour is equal to 1 real-world minute.

1 or more players move 1 Hex plot at a time around the World map. If multiple players are working together in a party, 1 member is designated as the dice roller and the person to draw the cards. If entering a dungeon, the designated person draws cards to determine the enemies and rewards within. If entering a town, cards are drawn to determine which quests are available. During gameplay, each player's character can increase the values of certain skills and abilities on their character sheet and they may add or remove party members.

The game continues until the player(s) decide the game should end.

—description from the designer
mechanics: Area Movement, Campaign / Battle Card Driven, Cooperative Game, Dice Rolling, Grid Movement, Hexagon Grid, Line of Sight, Multiple Maps, Role Playing, Scenario / Mission / Campaign Game, Solo / Solitaire Game

name: Dreidel Revolution
description:
Dreidel Revolution contains eight brand new games that remain authentic to the traditional Hanukkah game of dreidel, but add new elements to make the dreidel-playing experience better.

The game contains regular dreidels, plus original components like tokens, a Shamash button, and Eight Crazy Dice (d8 with dreidel symbols on them). These components broaden gameplay to allow for choice, strategy, and skill instead of the pure game of chance that is traditional dreidel. The eight games are:

"Gelt or Gift" gives players two competing ways to win and a choice to make after each spin.

"All Together Now" introduces simultaneous spinning so that every player participates in every turn.

"Follow the Leader" is a fairer form of traditional dreidel that gives everyone a chance to beat the best spin/roll combo.

"Beat the Dreidel" is a fast-paced game that requires skill, speed, and luck.

"Spin & Save" raises the stakes in each round, forcing players to choose whether to spend or bank their winnings.

"Hanukkah Chutzpah" tests your ability to tell a lie with a straight face. Can you fool the other players or will you get called out for your chutzpah?

"Superpowered Dreidels" gives each dreidel symbol a superpower that can be used to attack or defend a dreidel spin.

"Maccabee Stacking Bee" takes dreidels to the next level, using them for spinning and as building blocks in ever-growing stacking challenges.
mechanics: Betting and Bluffing, Dice Rolling, Stacking and Balancing

name: it's KARMA! the board game
description:
A chance/strategy roll and move derivative of the ancient reincarnation/morality game of snakes and ladders.

2-6 players compete to reach the finish by negotiating multiple path options, re-direction by special steps and employing non-player pieces to block/unblock paths for self and others.

a play option is included to extend play beyond the finish - as in the original game - such that the player that overshoots the finish returns to the game lower down the board.

3 dice are used.

—description from the publisher
mechanics: Dice Rolling

name: Lich Wars
description:
Inspired by classic TCGs like Magic The Gathering, Lich Wars is a fast-paced strategic card game for 2-4 players where you play as rival liches vying for supremacy! Command hordes of undead minions and cast devastating spells as you attempt to destroy your opponents' phylactery life sources and be the last player standing!

The goal of the game is to eliminate every other player by destroying their life source: one of their three phylacteries. Each player begins the game with three phylactery cards, but only one is keeping them in the game. In order to be victorious, you will need to uncover and destroy your opponents' phylacteries while also keeping yours well protected!

Gameplay elements include:

- Resource management
- Deduction / Bluffing
- Action point system
- Powerful combos and synergies
- Lots of "Take that!" moments
- A bit of luck!

At the start of the game, players first need to start placing down resource collecting minions. These are placed behind a phylactery and will be used for the duration of the game to fuel both your attacks and defense by producing blood, bones, and souls equal to their cost. These resources will be used to play other minions.
Ensure that your phylacteries are safe by guarding them with your minions. Using resources from your collector minions, you can place down a defender to protect one of your phylacteries. Build a strong defense by placing high health minions as defenders, and having spells ready to counter attacks.
There are countless ways to overcome your opponents' defenses and seal your victory! Once you have enough resources from your collector minions, launch your attack by spending symbols equal to your attacker's cost. Buff your minion with spells to create an unstoppable assault!

—description from the designer
mechanics: Action Points, Deduction, Take That

name: SportsBall Madness
description:
SportsBall Madness is a strategy dice game where the objective is to earn the most prize money across several tournaments (rounds). Your dice are your team of players, and as team managers you wisely choose which players to compete in each round. As the tournament progresses dice become injured, allowing teams to come back from behind and rake in easy wins.

After each tournament, you have the opportunity to pay from your winnings to keep your team together, or send players to the draft pool in the hopes of getting to pick an even better team for the next round.

—description from the designer
mechanics: Unspecified

name: Elemental, Force of Nature
description:
In Elemental, Force of Nature players take on the role of Elementals, powerful beings who are constantly battling and scheming to outdo each other by using and manipulating Natural Phenomena. Elementals have two main powers: crushing the Natural Phenomena of other Elementals with Phenomena of their own and manipulating the 6 primal elements that make up these Natural Phenomena to outwit their opponents.

As an Elemental, you will be dealt a hand of 7 Natural Phenomena cards. Going clockwise, Elementals take turns matching the elements on the cards while making sure to not leave too great of an opening for their opponents. The real strategy comes in gaining and using an Elemental's greatest resource: Elemental Tokens.

These token allow you to manipulate the elements that make up a Natural Phenomenon, or exchange Phenomena from your arsenal.

Your goal is to make sure no other Elemental can crush the Natural Phenomenon you play. Think of this as a battle for survival where the last one to play wins the round. A game is at least 3 rounds and the player who has won the most rounds wins and proves that they are the most powerful Elemental, a true force of nature!

—description from the designer
categories: Abstract Strategy, Card Game, Party Game
mechanics: Card Play Conflict Resolution, Hand Management, Matching, Memory, Pattern Recognition, Player Elimination, Rock-Paper-Scissors, Take That, Trick-taking

name: Monopoly: Beetlejuice
description:
Before you call his name three times, work your way through the strange and unusual afterlife of MONOPOLY: Beetlejuice! Buy, sell, and trade your favorite dark comedy characters such as Lydia, Delia, and Charles Dietz, Adam and Barbara Maitland, and the irreverent bio-exorcist himself to haggle the living daylights out of your competition and win with more than the “ghost with the most”! It’s showtime!

-description from publisher's website
mechanics: Roll / Spin and Move, Set Collection

name: Monopoly: Maastricht
description:
An edition of the commercially successful board game, Monopoly. This edition takes in the Dutch city of Maastricht.
Popular and well known areas are for sale including Koestraat, the Markt, the Kleine Staat and the Vrijthof.
mechanics: Auction/Bidding, Income, Lose a Turn, Player Elimination, Set Collection, Trading

name: Monopoly: Benevento Calcio
description:
In the 90th year since its foundation, Benevento Calcio is the first Serie B team to join the large Monopoly family.

Play with the protagonists of the 2019/2020 season and relive the emotions related to the recent history of the Samnite Club. Challenge friends and relatives, manage your finances in the best possible way, show all your Giallorossi passion and become the champion of Benevento Calcio Monopoly.


Nel 90esimo anno dalla sua fondazione, il Benevento Calcio é la prima squadra della Lega Serie B ad entrare nella grande famiglia del Monopoly.

Gioca con i protagonisti della stagione 2019/2020 e rivivi le emozioni legate alla storia recente del Club sannita. Sfida amici e parenti, amministra al meglio le tue finanze, mostra tutta la tua passione giallorossa e diventa il campione di Benevento Calcio Monopoly.
mechanics: Auction/Bidding, Lose a Turn, Player Elimination, Roll / Spin and Move, Set Collection, Trading

name: Monopoly: Airborne Museum
description:
The Airborne Museum of Sainte-Mère-Eglise presents its own edition of the game Monopoly. In this version, the Rue de la Paix gives way to the Waco glider, the Place du Paradis has become an M2 helmet and instead of becoming the owner of the Boulevard des Capucines, players will be able to acquire a Sherman tank. The players are thus in the shoes of a museum curator and will compete to acquire the most beautiful collector's items from the Airborne Museum!


L'Airborne Museum de Sainte-Mère-Eglise présente sa propre édition du jeu Monopoly. Dans cette version, la rue de la paix laisse place au planeur Waco, la place du Paradis est devenue un casque M2 et à la place de devenir propriétaire du boulevard des Capucines, les joueurs pourront acquérir un char Sherman. Les joueurs sont ainsi dans la peau d'un conservateur de musée et s'affronteront pour acquérir les plus belles pièces de collection du Airborne Museum !
mechanics: Auction/Bidding, Lose a Turn, Player Elimination, Roll / Spin and Move, Set Collection, Trading

name: Monopoly: FK Partizan
description:
Monopoly FK Partizan this edition takes in the Serbian football team of Partizan Belgrade.

Play classic Monopoly, but this time being a professional sports manager. Invest in stands and stadiums, rent and spend money.
mechanics: Auction/Bidding, Lose a Turn, Player Elimination, Roll / Spin and Move, Set Collection, Trading

name: Monopoly: Crvena Zvezda
description:
MONOPOLY FC RED STAR - a popular board game with the exclusive edition of Red Star Football Club.
Monopoly is a fast and exciting game of property trading. Invest in stadiums and stands, trade to your path to success.

The game contains: a game board, 8 figurines, 28 contract cards, 16 free kick cards, 16 penalty cards, 32 stadiums, 12 stands, 2 dice and money.


MONOPOL FK CRVENA ZVEZDA - popularna društvena igra sa aplikacijom i junacima FK CRVENA ZVEZDA. Monopol je brza i uzbudljiva igra trgovine posedima. Investirajte u stadione i štandove, obavite trgovinu do svog puta ka uspehu.
mechanics: Auction/Bidding, Income, Lose a Turn, Player Elimination, Roll / Spin and Move, Set Collection

name: Це Бізнес Крихітка
description:
Це Бізнес Крихітка ("This is Business Baby") is a board game with unique mechanics for those who want to learn financial literacy, improve their time management skills, and plunge into the world of entrepreneurship.

The game has a completely unique methodology and is based on the "win-win" strategy, where the most important thing is not victory, but the analysis of your actions during the game and interaction with other players.

In a playful way, you:

learn about the methods of earning;
organize your own business;
get the necessary skills to start your own business;
understand the importance of the resource of time;
train your creative thinking skills;
make your dream come true.
mechanics: Unspecified

name: Nova League
description:
Tudor Games is bringing Electric Football to the 35th century with Nova League! A new design by Brian and Geoff Engelstein, Nova League combines quick-playing modern game design with the classic fun that Electric Football has brought to generations of fans since 1947.

Play alternates between the Skill Phase, where you activate the common and special abilities of your team; and the Action Phase where you activate the vibrating board and see the action unfold in front of your eyes!

Nova League features:


12 unique characters, each with a special ability and detailed, custom sculpt.
24” x 13” vibrating playfield
Because of the physics of the vibrating table, the size and shape of the sculpts matters! Place extra pieces, including missiles, ice walls, and teleporters.
All new gameplay that is simple, but not simplistic. Be ready to play in 5 minutes and win in 30!


—description from the designer
mechanics: Real-Time

name: World Adventure: Ancient Runes
description:
World Adventure: Ancient Runes is an expandable 1-4 players turn-based strategic fantasy board game. In this game, you’ll compete against other Dark World Stone Keepers while collecting as many as Ancient Runes.

First player who has succeeded acquiring number of Ancient Runes will be the winner. Along the way, you must withstand monsters and other heroes which appeal to your attack, heal, buff, and de-buff skills.

In this episode, you will be brought into The Silk Road, which has some similarities with our current world besides its own supranatural and fantasy approach. This world bustles around Europe and Asia which were famous with valuable goods, such as silk, medicines, spices, metals, and foods.

Our game is inspired by other fantastic board game such as Merchant & Marauders, Scythe, and Zombicide. The storyline is influenced by novels and console games such as Sword Art Online, Log Horizon, Grimgar, Suikoden, Vandal Hearts, and Final Fantasy.

Games Feature:

Appealing Theme with Meeple Artwork
Multiple modern world heroes are summoned as Dark World Stone Keepers. Through Meeple Artwork, we strive our best to design custom artworks. It has one-of-a-kind mechanism which hero could be attached to various caravan and pets. All of these come in laser-cut finishing and great quality material.

Free Play
Privilege to build what kind of player you are. Win the game by being yourself!

Custom Game Plan
Start the game by choosing hero, caravan, and soldiers. Then infuse different skills to thrive Explorer, Charisma, or Leadership. Earn money to upgrade your caravan, purchase items, or strengthen your soldiers.

Multi In-Game Concept (America Games and Euro Games)
Be a Monster Hunter or Bandit if you prefer more challenges which will give you more gains. Be a Merchant or Warlord if you prefer winning the game through trading and vast business.

Rival or Semi Co-op
World Adventure: The Silk Road could be played by 2-4 people in a competitive or semi-cooperative mode that requires teamwork and strategy.

Solo Mode
World Adventure: Ancient Runes could be played in Solo Mode, with some achievements that you can share with other players. This mode also gives you some practices before taking a battle with other players.

—description from the publisher
categories: Adventure, Economic, Fantasy, Fighting, Novel-based, Pirates, Territory Building, Transportation
mechanics: Action Points, Area Majority / Influence, Dice Rolling, Grid Movement, Pick-up and Deliver, Role Playing, Variable Player Powers

name: To The Death: The Big Day
description: Promo scenario for To The Death, consisting of six cards celebrating the designers wedding day.
categories: Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Fighting, Medieval, Wargame
mechanics: Action Points, Area Majority / Influence, Campaign / Battle Card Driven, Deck, Bag, and Pool Building, Hand Management, Open Drafting, Solo / Solitaire Game

name: Try!
description:
Try! is intended to simulate Rugby Union. The board depicts a rugby pitch divided into squares and the players are represented by discs. There is also a piece representing the ball and a pair of dice.

On a turn a player rolls both dice, which give movement points to use for their players and/or the ball. One die is used for forwards and backwards movement and the other for sideways and diagonal movement.

The game generally follows Rugby Union rules (e.g. no forward passes) and points are scored the same way.

The game was published by the designer under the game APT Games.
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Square Grid

name: Monopoly: Grand Bordeaux
description:
A large part is devoted to Bordeaux itself, but other properties are located around the city.

Brown
Saint Michel (Bordeaux)
Cours Victor Hugo (Bordeaux)

Light Blue
Rue Sainte-Catherine (Bordeaux)
Les Chartrons (Bordeaux)
Cours du Chapeau-Rouge (Bordeaux)

Purple
Place des Quinconces (Bordeaux)
Place de la Bourse (Bordeaux)
Place des Grands Hommes (Bordeaux)

Orange
Eco-quartier Ginko (Bordeaux)
La Rivière
Portets

Red
Cadillac
Route du Médoc (Bordeaux)
Podensac

Yellow
Place de la Victoire
Place Gambetta

Green
Rue du Parlement Sainte-Catherine (Bordeaux)
Place du Parlement (Bordeaux)
Rue du Parlement Sainte-Catherine (Bordeaux)

Blue
Rue Montesquieu (Bordeaux)
Place de la Comédie (Bordeaux)

Stations
Les vélos Vcub
Gare Saint-Jean
Réseau TBC
Aéroport de Bordeaux
mechanics: Auction/Bidding, Income, Lose a Turn, Player Elimination, Roll / Spin and Move, Set Collection, Trading

name: Bogus Survival
description:
Bogus Survival invites players to use story-telling to escape weird and wacky scenarios. You can find yourself stuck on a marooned island, chased by a line of shopping carts, or even blackmailed by Winnie the Pooh. In each case, players will need to get creative to get out.

A game starts by splitting teams into equal survival skill. By using tool cards to create a cohesive escape narrative, the guessing team's survivalist gives clues to his team about which scenario card they are escaping. The opposing team, having selected the card, eagerly hopes they guess wrong.

Guess the scenario card correctly and the survivalist and their team are awarded the survival card. But guess wrong, and the point goes to the opposing team.

There's no time for bickering or second chances: the first team to 3 survival cards wins.

—description from the designer
mechanics: Deduction, Team-Based Game

name: Mr. Lobo's Monster Match Game
description:
YOU ARE INVITED! In the spooky Chestburster Mansion, Horror Host Mr. Lobo throws a party for Misunderstood Monsters to Mix and Mingle! Of course, Frankenstein, Dracula, Werewolf and Mummy get lucky, find their matches, and leave ealry. The B-Grade ghouls like Robot Monster, Phantom of Krankor and Gappa the Trifibian Giant even end up paring off! Soon, all the "Kool Kreatures" are gone... WILL YOU BE STUCK WITH MR. LOBO??

—description from the designer

All cards are shuffled and the deck is dealt out face down to each player. Players match all the cards that look alike in their hand and discard face up. Player to the left of Dealer draws one random card from the dealer's hand. If it matches one of the cards in their hand, they discard the pair on the table. Then they offer their cards to the player on their left, who draws a random card, and so on. Play continues until all pairs have been matched up and discarded. The player left with the "Mr. Lobo" card in their hand is the loser of the game and is laughed at! Then, awkward silence. Reshuffle and repeat!

—user summary
mechanics: Open Drafting

name: Going Concern
description:
Going Concern is a small box economic game, featuring an Art Deco artwork theme, focused on risk taking and risk management to accumulate wealth.

Play is divided into 12 rounds, each comprised of 2 phases. The first (Concerns Phase) offers opportunities to expand your business empire by purchasing assets (Manufacturing, Real Estate, Commodities) and earning payouts. In the second (Risk Phase), players encounter one-time effects, which either result in losing some of your Concerns, or receiving additional payouts.

Players manage risk through the purchase of craft politicians in the Concerns Phase, which limit downside in the Risk Phase, and through diversification.

—description from the publisher
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Investment, Open Drafting, Push Your Luck

name: Monopoly: Coraline
description:
Fans of Coraline and her “Other”-worldly adventures will feel right at home using tokens such as a Hair Pin, Looking Stone, and more to traverse the board, collecting Mr. Bobinsky, The Cat, and other memorable characters from the haunting stop-motion fantasy film.

—description from the publisher
mechanics: Roll / Spin and Move, Set Collection

name: Monopoly: Black Panther
description:
From the Warrior Falls Challenge Pool, to the Hall of Kings, to the Tribal Council Room in the Golden City, this Edition of the Monopoly game features locations and themes inspired by Marvel's Black Panther. Players can imagine exploring beautiful Wakanda with T'Challa and his people as they move around the board trying to make as many Alliances as they can. Build Villages and Strongholds, and make moves directed by the Kimoyo Beads cards and Heart-shaped Herb cards. The last player with money when all other players have gone bankrupt wins.


Includes gameboard, 6 tokens, 6 Character cards, 28 Title Deed cards (22 Alliances, 4 Transports, 2 Great Mound spaces), 16 Kimoyo Beads cards, 16 Heart-shaped Herb cards, 32 Villages, 12 Strongholds, 2 dice, Monopoly money pack, and game guide.


Features Marvel's Black Panther theme, locations, and characters

Play as a character's iconic mask, helmet, blade, gauntlet, or spear.

Players move tokens around the board making as many Alliances as they can.

Kimoyo Beads cards and Heart-shaped Herb cards direct players to do tasks such as handing over money or going to Jail.

-description from publisher's website
mechanics: Roll / Spin and Move, Set Collection

name: Monopoly: Ariège – Libres comme l'Air
description:
Monopoly: Ariège – Libres comme l'Air invites you to travel in Ariège.
By playing, with family or friends, you will progress from town to village, from plains to valleys and discover the exceptional landscapes of the Pyrenees. An ideal setting for practicing outdoor activities, summer and winter. Let yourself be seduced by a remarkable natural heritage, browse 14,000 years of history from cro-magnon to the present day through the Cathar castles, Ariege will have no secrets for you.

With the Ariège Monopoly, play to buy the properties of the department of Ariège between friends or family.

Build houses and hotels will allow you to win a maximum of rents during the game to be able to win it. At auctions, negotiate with your opponents to win the bet at the best price and acquire the most goods. It will take risks and be the smartest to win the game!
mechanics: Auction/Bidding, Income, Lose a Turn, Player Elimination, Roll / Spin and Move, Set Collection, Trading

name: Monopoly: City of Syracuse
description:
Our city of Syracuse (NY) is enjoying a revitalization of downtown businesses and living while continuing to provide world-class education and medical services to this great community. The creation of this authentic custom Monopoly board quickly took on a life of its own. The result is a pride piece showcasing our beloved city for all the people, places, businesses, organizations, cuisine, events and "Syracuse-isms" that are unique and special.

Your purchasing has helped feed hungry children, families and seniors in our community by supporting Food Bank of Central New York.

As you play this game with your friends and family, we hope you smile as you journey back to all the things that will always make Syracuse so special.

description from the back of the box
mechanics: Roll / Spin and Move, Set Collection

name: Zoom Inspector Spellor's Investigations
description:
10 crime scenes and many cases to solve… but not all the clues are obvious and not all the trails identified lead to a solution. Can you be a careful observer and find all the hidden details? Can you help Inspector Spellor in his investigation? To do this you will need to be faster than your playmates in finding all the words. By drawing the Chance cards and rolling the dice, you will continue the investigation, which will change from one game to the next. Each time the clues and the words to be found will be different. Their orthographic difficulties will put you to the test. Happy investigating everyone!

—description from the publisher
mechanics: Deduction, Dice Rolling

name: A Cold and Resolute Fight: The Battle for Narvik, April-June, 1940
description:
The German invasion of Demark and Norway, Operation Weserűbung, was a bold gamble by the invaders. The greatest risk for the Germans was at the northern most all weather port of Narvik. Here the Germans landed troops that quickly overwhelmed the local Norwegian garrison but left them entirely dependent upon supplies and reinforcements that would arrive by ship or air transport. The Allies recognized the German’s vulnerability and sent the Royal Navy into the Narvik fjord where their warships quickly sank all of the German vessels. With winter weather persisting, air transport would never be able to provide sufficient levels of men and material to sustain the now trapped German invaders. The Allies sent a mixed nationality force of British, French and Poles to support the Norwegian defense forces that were laying siege to the Germans. What resulted was an epic contest that threatened to unravel the Nazi blitzkrieg. Perhaps you can do as well or better?

Each copy of A Cold and Resolute Fight is composed of the following:

• Two 11 by 17 inch map sheets
• One sheet of 120 double-sided counters
• This set of rules.

Players will also need a standard deck of cards, one six-sided die (D6) and an opaque container (mug, envelope or anything similar) to play the game.

Most units are battalions of 700 to 800 men and their equipment (German KG are slightly smaller). Tank units represent 6-10 vehicles. A turn represents one week of time and a hex is slightly more than 2.5 miles across.

A Cold and Resolute Fight is designed by Paul Rohrbaugh and features graphics by Nils Johansson.

-description from designer
mechanics: Hexagon Grid, Open Drafting

name: Bolt Action: Campaign – D-Day: British & Canadian Sectors
description:
Bolt Action: Campaign – D-Day: British & Canadian Sectors
This campaign book focuses on some of the key clashes fought in Normandy in the summer of 1944 as British, Canadian, Polish, and other Allied forces engaged in desperate battles against a dedicated and determined German opposition. As well as summarising the history, this book also details a number of scenarios inspired by the engagements within the Normandy campaign, and the special rules required to play them.

This book tells the story of the British and Canadian contribution to this monumental task, and the stoic German resistance they faced. It guides Bolt Action players from the latter stages of D-Day, beginning with the fierce fighting in the coastal towns off the beaches at Gold, Juno and Sword, through the violent clashes around the strategically vital city of Caen, and to the march against Germany itself.

Inside, you’ll find thirteen diverse scenarios, covering the action from the first pushes inland, to the dramatic climax of the campaign in the British & Canadian sectors during Operation Tractable.  We’ve also included army lists for four of the campaign’s most important forces – the Canadian Army, the battle-hardened Commandos, the fanatical 12th SS Panzer Division ‘Hitlerjugend’, and the Luftwaffe Field Division. These new army lists add a whole new dimension of play, allowing you to create themed forces for your campaigns in Normandy!

Also included is a whole stable of new special characters, including the VC-winning medic Corporal Frederick Topham, who put life and limb on the line to rescue wounded men, and the fanatical Kurt ‘Panzer’ Meyer, who earned his Iron Cross leading the  Liebstandarte division’s reconnaissance battalion in Russia. These special characters are the perfect opportunity to theme your force further and make for amazing conversion opportunities.

—description from the publisher
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Miniatures, Wargame, World War II
mechanics: Scenario / Mission / Campaign Game

name: Monopoly: Real Betis Balompié
description:
A Monopoly about the Real Betis Balompié, created in 1907.

Play classic Monopoly, but this time being a professional sports manager. Invest in stands and stadiums, rent and spend the money in the official store.

Roll the dice and move around the board thanks to the pawns and travel through the best of the history of Los Verdiblancos - stadiums, best players, and the great victories in team history.

Live the life of a great manager in the fast-paced world of professional sports.
Put yourself in the shoes of a successful Real Betis Balompié manager.
Travel through the best of Betis history: stadiums, the best players and the great victories that made us vibrate with joy.
Invest in stands and stadiums, receive rent and spend the money in the official store.
Be smart and watchful, because there is only room for one at the top. Bankruptcy awaits the rest.
Now, Real Betis fans have the chance to continue enjoying this exclusive official edition of MONOPOLY.

Vive la vida de un gran gestor en el vertiginoso mundo del deporte profesional. Ponte en el lugar de un exitoso manager del Real Betis Balompié.
Viaja por lo mejor de la historia del Betis : estadios, los mejores jugadores y las grandes victorias que nos hicieron vibrar de alegría.
Invierte en gradas y estadios, recibe alquiler y gástate el dinero en la tienda oficial.
Sé astuto y mantente alerta, porque sólo hay sitio para uno en el primer puesto.
A los demás les espera la bancarrota. Ahora, los seguidores del Real Betis tienen la posibilidad de seguir disfrutando con esta exclusiva edición oficial de MONOPOLY.
mechanics: Auction/Bidding, Income, Lose a Turn, Player Elimination, Roll / Spin and Move, Set Collection, Trading
publishers: Eleven Force, Hasbro, Winning Moves UK Ltd.

name: Monopoly: Edición País Vasco
description:
Monopoly Edición País Vasco / Monopoly Euskadi Edizioa
Play in the different settings of the Basque country such as the Bizkaia bridge or the Traineras regattas and taste their pintxos and typical Basque cuisine dishes while you walk around the board.

Go to the Bosque de Oma and the Ría de Bilbao through the wonderful provinces that make up the Basque Country - will you get your rent paid?

Invest in houses and hotels and win the game.
mechanics: Auction/Bidding, Lose a Turn, Player Elimination, Roll / Spin and Move, Set Collection, Trading

name: Monopoly: Edición Navarra
description:
Live the life of an ambitious merchant in the fast-paced world of real estate with this Navarre edition of Monopoly.

Play in the different settings of Navarre.
From the statue of Ernest Hemingway in the bullring to the Royal Palace of Olite, passing through the Collegiate Church of Santa María de Roncesvalles, there are many places in Navarra where you can have fun.
mechanics: Auction/Bidding, Lose a Turn, Player Elimination, Roll / Spin and Move, Set Collection, Trading

name: Monopoly: Edición Galicia
description:
Live the life of an ambitious merchant in the fast-paced world of real estate with this Monopoly Galicia edition.

Discover the essence of Galicia in this amazing edition of Monopoly.

Its capital, Santiago de Compostela, is the final destination for pilgrims on the famous Camino de Santiago. Its landscapes gather lush valleys and impressive beaches. On its coastline, bathed by the Cantabrian Sea and the Atlantic Ocean, there are areas of spectacular cliffs such as those of A Costa da Morte or the incredible National Park of the Atlantic Islands of Galicia.

Play between charming seaside and inland towns and cities such as Santiago de Compostela, A Coruña, Ferrol, Lugo, Orense, Pontevedra or Vigo. Some of its monuments, such as the Tower of Hercules or the Walls of Lugo (both declared World Heritage by UNESCO) will surely leave you impressed.
mechanics: Auction/Bidding, Lose a Turn, Player Elimination, Roll / Spin and Move, Set Collection, Trading

name: Monopoly: Edición Cantabria
description:
Discover the essence of Cantabria in this amazing edition of Monopoly.

Cantabria has its own edition of the popular Monopoly game, where all the beauty of the region is reflected.

The Cantabrian version of the popular board game is based on the most emblematic places of the entire region and not focused on just one city, reflecting the beauty of Cantabria

The dynamics are the same as ever, only this time, the exciting game of real estate, has in its procurement list, the Cave of Altamira , the Nature Park Cabarceno , the Cave of the Soplao or the Field Golf Abra de Pas. But these are not the only properties that can be bought in the game since Salvé beaches , Oyambre or the Sardinero , share the limelight with some of the most outstanding areas of the region such as the mountain stew or the sobaos and quesadas.
mechanics: Auction/Bidding, Lose a Turn, Player Elimination, Roll / Spin and Move, Set Collection, Trading

name: Mini Macaron Madness
description:
In Mini Macaroon Madness, your job is to get trays of macaroons out to customers quickly. Mix up flavors and combinations in the right amount to earn favor and become the best macaroon baker.

Game Components
12 Macaroon Tokens
36 Macaroon Tray Cards
8 Dice

Set Up & Quick Play
Shuffle macaroon tokens and macaron tray cards.
Lay out a grid with 4 macarons on both the left and right. Roll the dice and make 4 columns on the top and bottom. Leave space for macaron tray cards to be laid out in a 4x4 grid. Each player receives 4 macaron tray cards.
On your turn, play as many macaron trays into the grid as possible. They need to match one of the two dice options and 1 of the 2 macaron options. Special action cards allow you to add to your turn. Use all 4 cards and receive 4 more. Continue to play until you are unable to play and then restock to 4 cards and end your turn.
When players complete a vertical column, they receive an extra macaron card and roll a die in the column. They may continue their turn.
When players complete a horizontal row, they score 1 point. They change up one of the two macarons and continue their turn. They may score additional points during their turn in that same row if they can place at least one macaron tray. When they are unable to play the row of trays is placed in the discard pile.
Play continues until a player scores 6 points. Keep track of your score on paper.

-description from publisher
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Open Drafting, Pattern Building

name: Helio
description:
As a balloon bouquet builder at Helio Balloon shop fill up orders as quickly as you can. Become a Master Balloon Blower at Helio when you reach 20 balloons strings or more in completed balloon bouquets.

Game Components
48 Balloon Tokens
36 Balloon Bouquet String Cards
6 colored dice

Set Up & Quick Play
Shuffle balloon string cards. Deal 4 to each player face up.
Place Balloon tokens in middle of playing area.
Players take turns rolling all 6 dice. Players match dice to cards by number of balloon strings or by color. Some dice may not be matched, set these dice aside as you complete your turn. Players exchange dice matched to cards one at a time for a balloon. If a player fills up the number of strings that card is completed and earns them 1 point per string. Leave one balloon on the card and place it to the right of your playing area. Return remaining balloons to draw pile. Add 1 new card per card filled.
Next player rolls for balloon and play continues.
Play continues until a player reaches 20 balloon strings, on full completed balloon bouquets.
Turns continue until each players has an equal number of turns. All Helio employees count up all their completed bouquet strings. In the case of a tie the player with the most bouquets wins.

-description from publisher
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Open Drafting, Roll / Spin and Move

name: Monopoly: Bilbao
description:
Monopoly is a roll-and-move game where players move around the game board buying or trading properties, developing their properties with houses and hotels. When opponents land on players owned property, the owning player collects rent from the landing player. Owning sets of properties increases the rent paid to the player who owns them, by the player who lands on the square. The ultimate goal is to have the most money and drive opponents into bankruptcy.

The classic Monopoly with constructions and other elements from Bilbao, in the Basque country, in Spain.
mechanics: Auction/Bidding, Lose a Turn, Player Elimination, Roll / Spin and Move, Set Collection, Trading

name: Monopoly: Stirling Edition
description:
The world's favourite family board game brings you another exciting Monopoly: Stirling Edition.

Choose your favourite token, tour the beautiful sights of Stirling, including Stirling Castle and The National Wallace Monument, and accumulate fortunes, but watch out for taxes, jail and bankruptcy.

You owe rent or reap the rewards?

Invest in houses and hotels and trade your way to success.

Monopoly, the great property trading board game finds its home in the vibrant Scottish city of Stirling: a city steeped in history yet offering a host of modern day attractions. Journey around the gameboard and explore landmarks including: The Church of the Holy Rude, Dunblane Cathedral and The King's Knot. Don't forget to stop off for some refreshments en route at The Birds and The Bees or Blairmains Farm Shop & Coffee Bothy. You can further relax with a spa date at The Stirling Highland Hotel or take in some art at the Stirling Smith Art Gallery and Museum.
mechanics: Auction/Bidding, Income, Lose a Turn, Roll / Spin and Move, Set Collection, Trading

name: Haunted: Get Scared to Death...Repeatedly!
description:
Skeptical of the rumors, you and your friends decide to see if that creepy old house on the corner lives up to its reputation.

Finding yourselves locked inside with all manner of horrors, you must fight your way out before the house scares you and your friends to death.

Well, at least they’re your friends for now...

Gain and lose Courage Points as you wander through the house, encountering Scares while gaining protective Totems. But don’t worry, dying of fright isn’t the end. You’ll get to haunt the others to keep them from winning and possibly come back from the dead yourself.

Be the first player to gain all six Totems to beat the house and live to tell the tale!

Quick and easy to learn, light and fun highly competitive game.

This is a hand crafted game, made to order with high quality, durable acrylic components.

—description from the designer
mechanics: Unspecified

name: Generals
description:
Generals is a strategy game for 2 to 4 players that can be played 1v1 or 2v2. Each player is the commanding general of a faction and must use tactical and strategic resource management to conquer their opponents.

During the game each player has to organize military units on the map, build structures and recruit more units to attack the opponent and gain Victory points.

Four asymmetric factions each with special abilities and skill cards are fighting for success. Upgrades and special carda are available to all players making the game unpredictable and incredibly strategic.

—description from the designer
mechanics: Unspecified

name: Ahead in the Clouds: Character Pack
description: The Character Pack consists of 2 new Impacta Skies Industrialist character cards and 9 chipboard tokens for tracking. 8 of the tokens are double sided character tokens to track contracts, and the 9th token is to track the rounds/blimp.
categories: Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Science Fiction
mechanics: Network and Route Building, Set Collection, Variable Player Powers

name: Whose Treasure
description:
Whose Treasure is a card game for people to make the time more enjoyable with friends. Players try to make full completed maps as soon as possible in the FIRST MODE match or as many as possible in the FINAL MODE match. Players take turns to put their cards on the table and draw cards from the deck to keep 4 cards in their hands.

Since many maps are almost complete over time, the game becomes more exciting, so players try to prevent others from completing the maps.

—description from the designer
mechanics: Multiple Maps, Race, Take That

name: Labirintiny: Core Set
description:
Labirintiny is a Fantasy themed Dungeon Crawling boardless boardgame, set in a neverending evershifting maze.
You are one of the four heroes lost in the maze. Each of you is unique: different abilities, powers, starting characteristics and capacities. But you all have the same aim: find the exit.
The first who finds it and makes it out alive causes the maze to collapse on the others, winning the game.

Labirintiny is a boardgame, but it's boardless. The "board" on which the players move is a maze formed by the cards. Each hero has its own particular start card, and every time a character steps "out of the board", a new card is placed in the maze.
Every card is unique, as every maze formed at every game.
It's practically impossible to play twice the same scenario.

Players move across the dungeon formed by the cards, looking for the exit. The dungeon is filled with monsters to defeat, chests to unlock, treasures to find, opportunities to seize, events that can change everything, and ways to obtain more objects and power.
The exits, even if found right away, are protected and difficult to pass through. Only the bravest will dare to challenge their defenses!

With Labirintiny you can: play alone against the maze; or with 2-4 players, each on their own; or 4 players paired in teams. In addition to these options there are different game modes included in the rules.
Another important aspect of the game is the size: the game adapts to the surface on which is played, and not vice-versa. You can play on a table, on the floor, on a chair, any surface as long as it's stable: your choice will determine the maximum size of the maze.

Self-produced by Mezzocielo&Friends,it's their first boardgame.

—description from the designer
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Grid Movement, Kill Steal, Modular Board, Move Through Deck, Pieces as Map, Turn Order: Pass Order, Variable Player Powers

name: Monopoly: Atalanta
description:
Atalanta football team themed Monopoly.

Atalanta Bergamasca Calcio is the football team of the city of Bergamo in Lombardy, Italy. Named after the Greek mythology heroine, the club has a long history since its founding in 1907.

Choose your token, place it on GO! and roll the dice to own it all!
There can be only one winner in the Monopoly game. Will it be you?

Fast-dealing property trading game. Players buy, sell and trade properties to win. Build houses and hotels on properties.
Change your fortune with Chance and Community Chest cards.
And bankrupt your opponents to win it all.
mechanics: Auction/Bidding, Lose a Turn, Player Elimination, Roll / Spin and Move, Set Collection, Trading

name: Monopoly: 1.FC Kaiserslautern
description:
Monopoly: 1.FC Kaiserslautern The must-have for every game collection is shining in the Betze garb for the first time, allowing the players to advance to fields such as the Fritz-Walter-Stadion or to the DFB Cup final in Berlin.

Classical fields like the Stations, Schlossallee & Co. are the milestones of the Betze-history and provide for a diabolically good renaissance of the Brettspielklassiker.
mechanics: Auction/Bidding, Income, Lose a Turn, Player Elimination, Roll / Spin and Move, Set Collection, Trading

name: Return to Earth
description:
The game is set a long time in the future, in a galaxy far nearer than you would have expected. Mankind has been forced into an uncivilised part of space due to its own self destruction. Earth has become overcrowded, and the poor are being shipped to the far reaches of space, so that the rich can live in luxury. Despite all the odds, the earthlings have managed to tame the once destructive alien nations bringing order to the galaxy. The United Federation of Planets now resides over the squabbling factions, and with the introduction of a unified currency it has made trading agreements for the first time in centuries possible. The continual mission for peace throughout the galaxy has yet to be established, but the humans are determined to one day make it happen.

You are a fourth generation migrant with an overwhelming urge to Return to Earth. They say it can’t be done, and once deported there is no going back. However, the stories of the home-world have always kept you interested, and you have never been one to follow protocol. You have worked your way up from a gutter thief, to the Captain of a star ship, and are just the right kind of upstart to stick it to the man.

On your last mission, you traded several tons of raw plasma for information about the “Returner”; a guy living in a star system at the edge of the galaxy. For a small fortune he will arrange a new identity, and a shuttle back to the home-world. You’re broke after the deal for his whereabouts, but this won’t stop you. Your goal is to fill your boots with a bucket load of cash, and pay this guy a visit. He is your only hope to Return to Earth...

Game play
The main part of the game board represents the galaxy and is made up of 10 systems, and each is divided into 11 sectors. The systems each have a core at their centre, and this is where random planets and stars are placed at the start of a game. The core of a system is where planets and major stars have formed over thousands of years.

At two centre points of the galaxy, where six systems have collided, they have crushed the cores to create asteroid belts. They are dangerous and time consuming to navigate.

In all but one system there is a sector that has a resource that can be mined, or collected by ships. The resources can be traded at any of the six inhabited planets found in the galaxy. They all have a space station where trade goods are imported and exported (by the players). Cargo purchased, ships are upgraded, and fuel and shields are replenished. They are also great places to board passengers (or fugitives), hire crew and find work. Entering a planetary core allows a ship to use its facilities, but docking fees and trips between them is costly, so players must plan their routes carefully and wisely.

Using the star ship (player mat), captains can trade and perform missions to earn the cash they need to return to earth. The missions involve dangerous jobs (legal or illegal), passenger transports (or fugitive smuggling), running cargo (or smuggling), and how a player behaves in the game can seriously dictate how they will be treated when they visit the space ports, or if they are approached by NPC ships.

At the start of a game each player begins with just enough to get them off the starting blocks, but they must expand their ship and crew quickly or fall prey to being picked off by space pirates or the other players. Adding tech to a ship helps them in tricky situations, whilst adding crew will aid them with their skills. The downside with crew is they need to be paid for each space run they are aboard, but they are much cheaper than having tech installed.

Games are timed and will come to an end when the time marker hits the end space, but a player can beat the clock and score victory, if they can win at one of six challenges determined at the start of a game. They range from earning a fixed number of dollars (enough to return to earth), being first to have a certain class of star ship, being first to complete a set number of missions, or a set number of rounds, or being first to earn enough fame or piracy.

As the game time slowly ticks away the galaxy is evolving and global events come in and out of play, making the game sometimes more challenging, but also adding an element of luck, something each and every player will need to survive in the alien galaxy and return to earth.

Available from The Game Crafter

—description from the designer
categories: Adventure, Exploration, Fighting, Negotiation, Pirates, Science Fiction, Space Exploration
mechanics: Action Points, Area Movement, Dice Rolling, Events, Hand Management, Income, Open Drafting, Pick-up and Deliver, Storytelling, Variable Player Powers, Variable Set-up

name: Oak & Iron: 3rd Rate Ship Expansion
description:
Oak & Iron ship expansions are designed to help players quickly and efficiently expand their fleets.
Scale : 1/600.
categories: Age of Reason, Expansion for Base-game, Miniatures, Nautical, Pike and Shot, Wargame
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Measurement Movement, Simulation

name: Fopp' den Frosch
description: Chaos at the frog pond! One child plays the frog with a huge frog eye mask. The other children hide the flies.
mechanics: Unspecified

name: Egalicon
description:
Your goal in Egalicon is to capture all pieces of one type from your opponent. Each player starts with twelve pieces on a 6x6 game board: four each of diamond, scissors, and paper, with diamond pieces able to capture scissors, scissors able to capture paper, and paper able to capture diamond.

On a turn, move one of your pieces, one of your towers, or only the top piece of one of your towers. You can move this piece or tower onto an adjacent space that:


is empty,
that has one of your own pieces or towers, or
that has an opposing piece or tower that you can capture.


When you move onto your own piece, those pieces form a tower; either player can look at the pieces within a tower prior to moving. Building towers allows for faster movement of multiple pieces on the game board at the risk of having multiple pieces removed at once, although you can split towers bit by bit by moving only the top piece on a turn.

When you capture an opposing piece or tower, you remove all of those captured pieces from the board. Capture all opposing pieces of one type to win.
mechanics: Rock-Paper-Scissors

name: Monopoly: Springboks
description:
The Monopoly board game meets South Africa's national rugby union team in this edition of Springbok Monopoly.
The Springboks are one of the most feared and admired rugby teams.

The Springbok Monopoly board game is a twist on the classic board game. Participants travel around the board and buy their favoritism Springbok players and rugby stadiums – they then negotiate with opponents in an attempt to build a rugby empire. A rugby ball, boot, goal posts, whistle and trophy replace the original tokens like the top hat. Monopolists will build stands and stadiums and trade their way to success.
mechanics: Auction/Bidding, Lose a Turn, Player Elimination, Set Collection, Trading

name: Presidential Rummy
description:
Presidential Rummy is a parody card game for 1-4 players where you match and swap "Presidents" based on their different attributes.

Be the first to score 100 points by achieving goals and you win! But watch out for the Drain the Swamp cards...

Features parody names and fun art evoking the Presidents of the United States.
mechanics: Connections, Matching, Melding and Splaying, Move Through Deck, Pattern Building, Pattern Movement, Pattern Recognition, Physical Removal, Set Collection, Solo / Solitaire Game, Turn Order: Pass Order

name: Fates & Favors
description:
Fates and Favors is a strategic, team-based, track-movement game combined with Greek mythology.

Players are Greek heroes invited to Mount Olympus to pay tribute to the gods by building temples in their honor. To win the game, heroes work with their teammate to complete two temples before the other team.

Heroes use the game’s dynamic card play to strategically choose actions in response to the evolving gameplay. Fate cards are the primary basis for movement while Favor cards are powerful interventions from the Olympians. While heroes have the means to control their own fate through clever moves and efficient teamwork, a few perfectly timed godly favors can unexpectedly shift the momentum of the competition in the blink of an eye!

Fates and Favors’ is finely-tuned to provide heroes memorable experiences with epic comebacks, sweet revenge, and high-stakes anticipation as both teams race to complete their temples!

—description from the designer
mechanics: Team-Based Game, Track Movement

name: History Maker Golf: Course Collection 10
description:
Includes four courses:
Avian Wood CC, Charlotte, NC
Hills of Eire, Erin, WI
Rattlesnake GC, Palm Harbor, FL
Sunset Canyon CC, Pacific Palisades, CA.
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Simulation

name: Evil Baby Overkill
description:
Evil Baby Overkill is the most complete edition of the Evil Baby series so far, featuring fully remastered cards, the addition of new 'Curse' cards, specially designed for party and game nights, inflict unique restrictions on the player and must be obeyed until the game ends or the player draws a replacement 'Curse'.

We have racked up countless hours playtesting and perfecting the game mode and I can promise, new and returning players of the franchise, this new edition is set to be an awesome new edition to your game nights.

Out with the old and in with the new, the cards have been completely remastered, you will notice the 'gore' element has been removed completely making the game family-friendly (well almost). Each card has been given a complete makeover to ensure the game is played faster and with more momentum than ever before.

—description from the designer
categories: Comic Book / Strip, Horror, Party Game
mechanics: Open Drafting

description:
Includes four courses:
Greens Bayou GC, Humble, TX

Includes four international courses:

El Saltamontes Golf Club, Mexico City, Mexico
Glen Ebbe, Oakville, Ontario, Canada
Royal Hawtree GC, Lancashire, England

Founders Golf Club and Links, Southampton, NY
Ocean Knoll Club and Lodge, Orlando, FL
Spirit of Scotland GC, Dublin, OH

description:
Includes four USA courses:

Capitol CC at Avalon Farms, Potomac, MD
Greater Greensboro CC, Greensboro, NC
Prairie Hills CC, Tulsa, OK
